scripts.cmake-configure: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path build-wasm) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build-wasm }; mkdir build-wasm; cd build-wasm; C:\\emsdk\\emsdk.ps1 activate latest; cmake .. -G 'Unix Makefiles' -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=C:/vcpkg/scripts/buildsystems/vcpkg.cmake -DVCPKG_CHAINLOAD_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=C:/emsdk/upstream/emscripten/cmake/Modules/Platform/Emscripten.cmake -DVCPKG_TARGET_TRIPLET=wasm32-emscripten"
scripts.cmake-build: powershell -Command "cd build-wasm; C:\\emsdk\\emsdk.ps1 activate latest; emmake make -j16"
scripts.compile-wasm: npm run cmake-configure && npm run cmake-build
